scripts.deploy: yarn run generate && git add .output/public && git commit -m 'deploy' && git subtree push --prefix .output/public origin gh-pages
scripts.force-push-subtree: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix=.output/public main`:gh-pages --force
scripts.force-deploy: yarn run generate && git add .output/public && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix=.output/public main`:gh-pages --force
